headline: Fifth Third Bancorp Announces Redemption of Series L Preferred Stock
summary: CINCINNATI, September 19, 2025--Fifth Third Bancorp (Nasdaq: FITB) today announced that it has submitted a redemption notice to the Depositary for redemption of (1) all of its outstanding 4.500% Fixed-Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series L (CUSIP 316773DC1) (the "Series L Preferred Stock"), and (2) all outstanding receipts evidencing depositary shares representing the Series L Preferred Stock (CUSIP No. 316773DB3) (the "Depositary Shares").
